sources.title: On the Old Spanish Trail
sources.description: With a $10,000 note Roy co-signed for the Pioneers due, Roy plans to get the money from the reward for the capture of the Gypsy (Tito Guízar). After he captures him he lets him go realizing he is innocent and it's not long before the real outlaws show their hand.

sources.title: On the Old Spanish Trail (1947) ROY ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Roy Rogers, Trigger, Tito Guízar
Director: William Witney

With a $10,000 note Roy co-signed for the Pioneers due, Roy plans to get the money from the reward for the capture of the Gypsy. After he captures him he lets him go realizing he is innocent and it's not long before the real outlaws show their hand.

metadata.Plot: With a $10,000 note Roy co-signed for the Pioneers due, Roy plans to get the money from the reward for the capture of the Gypsy. After he captures him he lets him go realizing he is innocent and it's not long before the real outlaws show their hand.
